```{r setup, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
library(wesanderson)
library(lme4)

theme_set(theme_cowplot())
```

## Zooplankton Example

```{r}
ZP <- read_csv("../data/Zooplankton.csv", col_types = "cdd") |>
  mutate(Treatment = factor(Treatment),
         Block = factor(Block))

ZP |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Block, y = Zooplankton, color = Treatment)) +
  geom_point(size = 5)

```
